amendment.description: To provide for the continued development of a competitive propulsion system for the Joint Strike Fighter program and additional amounts, with an offset, for UH-1Y/AH-1Z rotary wing aircraft and Joint Strike Fighter program management reserves.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1767 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 38 - 59. Record Vote Number: 240.

action.text: Amendment SA 1767 proposed by Senator Bayh. (consideration: CR S7952-7964; text: CR S7952) To provide for the continued development of a competitive propulsion system for the Joint Strike Fighter program and additional amounts, with an offset, for UH-1Y/AH-1Z rotary wing aircraft and Joint Strike Fighter program management reserves.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 1767 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 38 - 59. Record Vote Number: 240.
Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 1767 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 38 - 59. Record Vote Number: 240.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1767 proposed by Senator Bayh.
